plot: Peter and Marcus, like any good couple, do everything together, including going to the gym... so where exactly does gym bunny Jeremy fit in? Working it out may not be that easy.
title: Working It Out
plot_es: Peter and Marcus, like any good couple, do everything together, including going to the gym... so where exactly does gym bunny Jeremy fit in? Working it out may not be that easy.
plot_en: Peter and Marcus, like any good couple, do everything together, including going to the gym... so where exactly does gym bunny Jeremy fit in? Working it out may not be that easy.
